feed.title: convention/standard for sorting public keys for p2sh multisig transactions

entry.title: convention/standard for sorting public keys for p2sh multisig transactions
entry.summary: In a discussion on January 14, 2015, Eric Lombrozo stated that internally pubkeys are DER-encoded integers. However, the person he was speaking with believed that pubkeys were represented as raw integers and only used DER encoding for signatures.
